title: White chocolate raspberry muffins
ingredients: ['125g fresh raspberries', '125g caster sugar', '55g butter, softened', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '280g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '125ml single cream', '100ml milk', '100g chopped white chocolate', '2 tablespoons soft brown sugar', '2 tablespoons demerara sugar']
